discussion.p: The standard doesn't say what it means if match_prev_avail is set. Table [tab:re.matchflag] says:

blockquote.p: --first is a valid iterator position. When this flag is set the flags match_not_bol and match_not_bow shall be ignored by the regular expression algorithms () and iterators ().

discussion.p:
What difference does it make whether --first is a valid iterator position or not?
What behaviour is changed when it's a valid iterator position? The standard doesn't say anything else about that.
When do the regex algorithms care about --first?
